broom.helpers 1.1.0.9000

Select variables to keep/drop

Source: R/tidy_select_variables.R
tidy_select_variables.Rd

Will remove unselected variables from the results. To remove the intercept, use tidy_remove_intercept().

tidy_select_variables(x, include = everything(), model = tidy_get_model(x))

Arguments

x

a tidy tibble
include

variables to include. Accepts tidyselect syntax. Use - to remove a variable. Default is everything(). See also all_continuous(), all_categorical(), all_dichotomous() and all_interaction()
model

the corresponding model, if not attached to x

Details

If the variable column is not yet available in x, tidy_identify_variables() will be automatically applied.

See also

Other tidy_helpers: tidy_add_coefficients_type(), tidy_add_contrasts(), tidy_add_estimate_to_reference_rows(), tidy_add_header_rows(), tidy_add_reference_rows(), tidy_add_term_labels(), tidy_add_variable_labels(), tidy_attach_model(), tidy_identify_variables(), tidy_plus_plus(), tidy_remove_intercept()

Examples

res <- Titanic %>%
  dplyr::as_tibble() %>%
  dplyr::mutate(Survived = factor(Survived)) %>%
  glm(Survived ~ Class + Age * Sex, data = ., weights = .$n, family = binomial) %>%
  tidy_and_attach() %>%
  tidy_identify_variables()

res

#> # A tibble: 7 x 9
#>   term  variable var_class var_type var_nlevels estimate std.error statistic
#>   <chr> <chr>    <chr>     <chr>          <int>    <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>
#> 1 (Int… (Interc… NA        interce…          NA    2.18      0.176    12.4  
#> 2 Clas… Class    character categor…           4   -1.03      0.200    -5.17 
#> 3 Clas… Class    character categor…           4   -1.81      0.176   -10.3  
#> 4 Clas… Class    character categor…           4   -0.803     0.160    -5.03 
#> 5 AgeC… Age      character dichoto…           2   -0.110     0.335    -0.328
#> 6 SexM… Sex      character dichoto…           2   -2.62      0.151   -17.3  
#> 7 AgeC… Age:Sex  NA        interac…          NA    1.90      0.433     4.39 
#> # … with 1 more variable: p.value <dbl>
res %>% tidy_select_variables()

#> # A tibble: 7 x 9
#>   term  variable var_class var_type var_nlevels estimate std.error statistic
#>   <chr> <chr>    <chr>     <chr>          <int>    <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>
#> 1 (Int… (Interc… NA        interce…          NA    2.18      0.176    12.4  
#> 2 Clas… Class    character categor…           4   -1.03      0.200    -5.17 
#> 3 Clas… Class    character categor…           4   -1.81      0.176   -10.3  
#> 4 Clas… Class    character categor…           4   -0.803     0.160    -5.03 
#> 5 AgeC… Age      character dichoto…           2   -0.110     0.335    -0.328
#> 6 SexM… Sex      character dichoto…           2   -2.62      0.151   -17.3  
#> 7 AgeC… Age:Sex  NA        interac…          NA    1.90      0.433     4.39 
#> # … with 1 more variable: p.value <dbl>
res %>% tidy_select_variables(include = "Class")

#> # A tibble: 4 x 9
#>   term  variable var_class var_type var_nlevels estimate std.error statistic
#>   <chr> <chr>    <chr>     <chr>          <int>    <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>
#> 1 (Int… (Interc… NA        interce…          NA    2.18      0.176     12.4 
#> 2 Clas… Class    character categor…           4   -1.03      0.200     -5.17
#> 3 Clas… Class    character categor…           4   -1.81      0.176    -10.3 
#> 4 Clas… Class    character categor…           4   -0.803     0.160     -5.03
#> # … with 1 more variable: p.value <dbl>
res %>% tidy_select_variables(include = -c("Age", "Sex"))

#> # A tibble: 5 x 9
#>   term  variable var_class var_type var_nlevels estimate std.error statistic
#>   <chr> <chr>    <chr>     <chr>          <int>    <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>
#> 1 (Int… (Interc… NA        interce…          NA    2.18      0.176     12.4 
#> 2 Clas… Class    character categor…           4   -1.03      0.200     -5.17
#> 3 Clas… Class    character categor…           4   -1.81      0.176    -10.3 
#> 4 Clas… Class    character categor…           4   -0.803     0.160     -5.03
#> 5 AgeC… Age:Sex  NA        interac…          NA    1.90      0.433      4.39
#> # … with 1 more variable: p.value <dbl>
res %>% tidy_select_variables(include = starts_with("A"))

#> # A tibble: 3 x 9
#>   term  variable var_class var_type var_nlevels estimate std.error statistic
#>   <chr> <chr>    <chr>     <chr>          <int>    <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>
#> 1 (Int… (Interc… NA        interce…          NA    2.18      0.176    12.4  
#> 2 AgeC… Age      character dichoto…           2   -0.110     0.335    -0.328
#> 3 AgeC… Age:Sex  NA        interac…          NA    1.90      0.433     4.39 
#> # … with 1 more variable: p.value <dbl>
res %>% tidy_select_variables(include = all_categorical())

#> # A tibble: 6 x 9
#>   term  variable var_class var_type var_nlevels estimate std.error statistic
#>   <chr> <chr>    <chr>     <chr>          <int>    <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>
#> 1 (Int… (Interc… NA        interce…          NA    2.18      0.176    12.4  
#> 2 Clas… Class    character categor…           4   -1.03      0.200    -5.17 
#> 3 Clas… Class    character categor…           4   -1.81      0.176   -10.3  
#> 4 Clas… Class    character categor…           4   -0.803     0.160    -5.03 
#> 5 AgeC… Age      character dichoto…           2   -0.110     0.335    -0.328
#> 6 SexM… Sex      character dichoto…           2   -2.62      0.151   -17.3  
#> # … with 1 more variable: p.value <dbl>
res %>% tidy_select_variables(include = all_dichotomous())

#> # A tibble: 3 x 9
#>   term  variable var_class var_type var_nlevels estimate std.error statistic
#>   <chr> <chr>    <chr>     <chr>          <int>    <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>
#> 1 (Int… (Interc… NA        interce…          NA    2.18      0.176    12.4  
#> 2 AgeC… Age      character dichoto…           2   -0.110     0.335    -0.328
#> 3 SexM… Sex      character dichoto…           2   -2.62      0.151   -17.3  
#> # … with 1 more variable: p.value <dbl>
res %>% tidy_select_variables(include = all_interaction())

#> # A tibble: 2 x 9
#>   term  variable var_class var_type var_nlevels estimate std.error statistic
#>   <chr> <chr>    <chr>     <chr>          <int>    <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>
#> 1 (Int… (Interc… NA        interce…          NA     2.18     0.176     12.4 
#> 2 AgeC… Age:Sex  NA        interac…          NA     1.90     0.433      4.39
#> # … with 1 more variable: p.value <dbl>
res %>% tidy_select_variables(
  include = c("Age", all_categorical(dichotomous = FALSE), all_interaction())
)

#> # A tibble: 6 x 9
#>   term  variable var_class var_type var_nlevels estimate std.error statistic
#>   <chr> <chr>    <chr>     <chr>          <int>    <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>
#> 1 (Int… (Interc… NA        interce…          NA    2.18      0.176    12.4  
#> 2 Clas… Class    character categor…           4   -1.03      0.200    -5.17 
#> 3 Clas… Class    character categor…           4   -1.81      0.176   -10.3  
#> 4 Clas… Class    character categor…           4   -0.803     0.160    -5.03 
#> 5 AgeC… Age      character dichoto…           2   -0.110     0.335    -0.328
#> 6 AgeC… Age:Sex  NA        interac…          NA    1.90      0.433     4.39 
#> # … with 1 more variable: p.value <dbl>
